rev.diff:
Line 15: Line 15:
Plesk allows a server [[system administrator|administrator]] to set up new [[website]]s, [[e-mail]] accounts, and [[Domain name system|DNS]] entries through a [[web browser|web]]-based interface. The administrator can create client and site templates, which predetermine resource allocation parameters for the domains and/or clients.
Plesk allows a server [[system administrator|administrator]] to set up new [[website]]s, [[e-mail]] accounts, and [[Domain name system|DNS]] entries through a [[web browser|web]]-based interface. The administrator can create client and site templates, which predetermine resource allocation parameters for the domains and/or clients.
â
Plesk for [[Linux distributions|Linux]]/[[Unix-like|UNIX]] supports multiple [[POSIX]] platforms, including [[Red Hat Linux]]/[[Fedora Core|Fedora]], [[SUSE]], [[Debian]]/[[Ubuntu Linux|Ubuntu]] and [[FreeBSD]]. Plesk for [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] supports [[Windows 2003|Windows Server 2003]] and [[Windows 2008|Windows Server 2008]] operating systems.
+
Plesk for [[Linux distributions|Linux]]/[[Unix-like|UNIX]] supports multiple [[POSIX]] platforms, including [[Red Hat Linux]]/[[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]], [[SUSE]], [[Debian]]/[[Ubuntu Linux|Ubuntu]] and [[FreeBSD]]. Plesk for [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] supports [[Windows 2003|Windows Server 2003]] and [[Windows 2008|Windows Server 2008]] operating systems.
Plesk installs custom versions of or manages versions of [[MySQL]] and [[PostgreSQL]] databases ([[MSSQL|Microsoft SQL server]] and [[MSDE|Microsoft SQL Server Desktop Engine]] under Windows), [[Jakarta Tomcat|Tomcat]] [[Java platform|Java]] server, [[ColdFusion]] server, as well as ''[[CounterStrike]]'' and ''[[Battlefield 1942]]'' game servers.
Plesk installs custom versions of or manages versions of [[MySQL]] and [[PostgreSQL]] databases ([[MSSQL|Microsoft SQL server]] and [[MSDE|Microsoft SQL Server Desktop Engine]] under Windows), [[Jakarta Tomcat|Tomcat]] [[Java platform|Java]] server, [[ColdFusion]] server, as well as ''[[CounterStrike]]'' and ''[[Battlefield 1942]]'' game servers.
